maqras.text: Amek tga Loennet i ippuweaaden i wid ieezzben: ddaw as isaffen ppazzalen, lqut is akked tili s, d imezgiyen. D tagi ay d taggara n wid ieezzben. Taggara ijehliyen, d times
Wid iwumi Nefka Tazmamt, ad feoeen s wayen i k d irsen. Illa wayen ugin kra ikabaren. Ini: "pwamoe$ kan ad aabde$ Oebbi, ur aS pcarake$. Pnuju$ $uoeS, tu$alin iw $uoeS
Akka ay t id Nessers, d uuwab, s taaoabt. Ma teddiv d lhawiyya nnsen, deffir tisin n tussna $uoek, ur k ipfukku bab ne$ asettao, seg ufus n Oebbi
Ni$ Nuzen ed imazanen, uqbel ik, Nefka yasen tilawin, tarwa. Ur ippunefk ara i umazan a d iawi assekni siwa ma Iaammed Oebbi. Yal lajel s Tezmamt is
Iseffev u Itebbit Oebbi ay S ihwan. £uoeS tayimmap n Tezmamt
Ama Nessken ak kra n wayen i sen Naahed, ama Neddem ooue ik, ay fellak kan d isallen, ay fella£ d aqeiii
Day ur walan ara Neppas ed ar tmurt, Nessenqas di leryaf is? Oebbi Ipseyyi; yiwen ur ipnamar aseyyi iS. Neppa, Ip$awal di leesab
Ni$ ppandin wid i ten id izwaren. Tieeoci, akw, ar Oebbi. Ieoa i ikseb yal iman. Ad eoen ijehliyen anwa ara iawven s Axxam
Qqaoen wid ijehlen: "ur telliv d amazan". Ini: "ad Iqadd Oebbi d Anagi gari yidwen, akked kra isaan tussna n Tazmamt
Alo. Tazmamt, Nessers ak p id, iwakken a ppessuff$ev imdanen si tillas ar tafat, s wannuf n Mass nnsen, s abrid n Wuzmir, Amaazuz
Oebbi ilan i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. A ssxev ijehliyen, ilmend uaaqeb uqsie
i ismenyafen tameddurt n ddunit wala laxeot, i iswexxioen seg ubrid n Oebbi, u ssaramen t d uawij! Widak, atnan di ttelfan u$miq
Ur d Nuzen amazan, siwa s tmeslayt n ugdud is, iwakken ad asen ibeggen. Oebbi Itellif win i S ihwan, Inehhu win i S ihwan. Neppa d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Ih, ni$ Nuzen ed Musa, s issekniyen nne£: "ssuffe$ agdud ik, si tillas ar tafat. Mmekti yas d ussan n Oebbi". Deg waya, war ccekk, d issekniyen i yal aueboi isnemmiren

Mi inna Musa i ugdud is: "mmektit ed l$it ikwen I$at Oebbi, mi kwen Isellek si lois n Feraun, i issuken fellawen lhemm uqsie. Zellun arrac nnwen, ssidiren tilawin nnwen. Deg waya, s$uo Mass nnwen, d cedda tameqwoaeant
Mi d Inna Mass nnwen: "ma tesnemmrem, ih, ad awen Rnu$. Ma tjehlem, aaaqeb iW, war ccekk, ad iwaao
Inna Musa: "ma tjehlem, kunwi akked wid n tmurt meooa, ihi, Oebbi d Asaay, d Amaazuz

Day ur kwen id ibbwiv ara usali imezwura nnwen: agdud n Nue, Aad, Tamud, akked wid iten ivefoen? Ur ten issin yiwen, siwa Oebbi. Usan ten id imazanen nnsen, s ubeggen. Rran ifassen nnsen s imawen nnsen, nnan: "S tidep, nejhel ayen i$ef d teppuceggaam. Ih, nekwni di ccekk imcebbwel, $ef wayen u$uo la $ tneccdem
